EM-Segmentation
==========================

#. Check out tutorials at `pytorch_connectomics <https://zudi-lin.github.io/pytorch_connectomics/build/html/tutorials/snemi.html>`_

#. A Pytorch-based end-to-end segmentation pipeline for neurons (`SNEMI3D
   dataset <https://vcg.github.io/newbie-wiki/build/html/data/data_em.html#snemi3d-segmentation>`_), synapse (`CREMI dataset <https://vcg.github.io/newbie-wiki/build/html/data/data_em.html#cremi-segmentation-synapse>`_) and mitochondria (`Lucchi dataset <https://vcg.github.io/newbie-wiki/build/html/data/data_em.html#lucchi-mitochondria>`_)
